title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.1 - Application

State Regulations
(a) This part
applies to filing, processing, hearing, consideration, and determination of
every proceeding wherein they may be relevant and appropriate. (b) The word "Board," shall include the

Board, any individual member of the Board, or an employee of the Board
designated and delegated such authority by the Board. (c) The Board may on its own motion, or the
motion of any party, suspend the application of any provision of these rules in
a specific proceeding, or waive compliance with any provision of these rules, so long as no substantial right is prejudiced. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.1

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

Time periods prescribed by statute cannot be
extended. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
